title: Regulate Your Nervous System | 15 Minute Yoga Practice
description:
Homeostasis, here we come. Take 15 minutes to tend to your nervous system with this regulating rest and digest practice. In this video you will find valuable techniques to cultivate a sense of safety and grounding in times of nervous system disregulation. 

Gently guide your body back to a harmonious state through awareness of the breath. Regulate the nervous system by entering the role of the observer. Release self-judgment by practicing self-compassion. The mat is your place to return home to yourself, and a great place to become more familiar with your unique window of tolerance. 

Soothe symptoms of stress and nurture the parasympathetic nervous system (AKA the “rest and digest” state) with this calming yoga practice. We will do it together. 

Save this session for when you are feeling off balance and need an energetic reset.

Let me know how this one goes for you in the comments!!

channelDescription:
WELCOME to Yoga With Adriene! Our mission is to connect as many people as possible through high-quality free yoga videos. 
We welcome all levels, all bodies, all genders, all souls!
If you're brand-new to yoga, check out my Yoga For Beginners and Foundations of Yoga series. These are designed to give you the tools to build a happy, healthy at-home yoga practice. 
Do your best, be authentic, and FIND WHAT FEELS GOOD.
Jump on in! You don't even have to leave your house. 

Love, Adriene

comments: Made with love after delving into my own healing journey with the nervous system which my body definitely called on me to address (Via body anxiety and panic attacks a couple years ago.) It's an ongoing process and almost everyone can benefit from short and consistent practices that help us tune into our individual nervous system health and utilize the tools to guide back toward homeostasis. It can also just feel good to give these issues visibility and allow there to be more accessible shame free support. I got you. Thank you for sharing your practice with me.

Awaken day 12🎉 thank you, Adriene, perfect Saturday practice and is just what my body needed, I've been tired all day due to a hard night trying to get to sleep, hopefully tonight will be better after this practice. 💖🧘🏼‍♀️🙏🏻
A short and sweet reset. Why do I feel so good after this practice?! I didn't think I was feeling nervous, but now I am much relieved. Thanks, Adriene, for every day's cure.
I started watching these at 19… I’m 27 now and still pop in when I need more guidance thank you!!!!

My yoga space today was filled with bright sunshine through the window. It was really lovely to reside in its light. I allowed my breath to flow however it wanted, no resisting or pushing. Thank you for such a loving start to the day!
